title: PML-N leader warns of consequences for those invading Islamabad
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 16 (APP):Dr. Tariq Fazal Chaudhry, a senior figure of the Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N), warned that anyone contemplating an invasion of Islamabad would face repercussions.
Speaking to the media, Tariq Fazal Chaudhry questioned the Chief Minister Khyber Pakhtunkhwaâ€™s legitimacy in discussing the invasion of Islamabad.
Tariq Fazal Chaudhry asserts that the Pakistan Muslim League-N advocates for constructive politics and believes that dialogue is the sole means to address any political issue.
He stressed the need to discontinue the practice of vilifying institutions.
The PML-N leader emphasized that engaging in dialogue should not be interpreted as a sign of weakness by the ruling coalition.
